model_answer: The answer is A: [00:04:12 - 00:04:34]. The narrator mentions the fake "Stitch & Dart" kit in relation to a follower who informed Lee about it being purchased as a joke. The visual aid shows an AliExpress product page for a yellow kit, which matches the description given by the narrator. The subsequent mention of the riders posing with a red arrow highlighting "GIANT ORMOND" on their shorts does not seem to be directly related to the discussion of the fake kit.

The answer is C: [00:03:38 - 00:04:12]. The speaker mentions that after watching the video, skip forward to the big dropping section of the hell ride up Oliver's Hill in Frankston, before transitioning into Mount Eliza. This corresponds to the time frame from 00:03:38 to 00:04:12 in the audio.
